short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you to breathe and relax!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feeling stressed out? Time to breathe helps you by providing you with an visual breathing exercise of 3 minutes. By breathing deeply for 5 seconds in and 5 seconds out we can suppress the natural stress response. Stress has a big impact on our cognitive functioning. By taking some small pauses to breath we can feel and perform our very best! You can reach me on twitter @aidenbuis if you have questions or feedback.
